link_desc:
This is a template plus a script for the agent that will allow you to visualise the licences controlled by FlexLM.

The script does discovery and templating of graphs, so in theory once installed everything should automatically happen.

You will need to tweak the installation instructions to suit your distro.

You will need to tweak the agent-side script according to your installation of FlexLM and the location of the licence.dat file.
author: speculatrix
